title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join our AI team. You will design and implement ML systems, work on large-scale distributed systems, and collaborate with research teams to bring cutting-edge AI to production.
requirements: MS/PhD in CS or related field. 5+ years of ML experience. Expertise in TensorFlow or PyTorch. Strong Python skills. Experience with distributed computing.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Join Meta's engineering team to build products that connect billions of people. You'll work on React-based frontends and scalable backend services.
requirements: BS in Computer Science. 3+ years of full-stack development. Experience with React and Node.js. Strong problem-solving skills.

title: Data Scientist
description: Amazon is hiring Data Scientists to solve complex problems using statistical modeling and machine learning. You'll analyze large datasets to drive business decisions.
requirements: MS in Statistics, Mathematics, or CS. 2+ years of data science experience. Proficiency in Python and SQL. Experience with AWS services.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Lead DevOps initiatives for Azure cloud services. Design CI/CD pipelines, manage infrastructure as code, and ensure high availability of production systems.
requirements: 5+ years in DevOps/SRE roles. Expertise in Kubernetes, Terraform, and Azure. Strong scripting skills in Python or Bash.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build beautiful, responsive user interfaces for Airbnb's web and mobile applications. Work with designers to create seamless user experiences.
requirements: 3+ years of frontend development. Expert in React and TypeScript. Experience with responsive design and accessibility.

title: Backend Python Developer
description: Join Stripe's backend team to build secure, scalable payment infrastructure. You'll work with Python and distributed systems to process billions in payments.
requirements: 4+ years backend experience. Strong Python expertise. Experience with distributed systems and databases.

title: AI Research Scientist
description: Conduct cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence. Publish papers, develop new algorithms, and contribute to AGI development.
requirements: PhD in ML, AI, or related field. Strong publication record. Expertise in deep learning and NLP.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Design and implement cloud architectures for enterprise customers. Provide technical guidance on AWS best practices and migrations.
requirements: 7+ years of IT experience. AWS certifications preferred. Experience with enterprise architecture.

title: Data Engineer
description: Build and maintain data pipelines that power Netflix's recommendation engine and analytics. Work with petabytes of streaming data.
requirements: 3+ years data engineering. Experience with Spark, Kafka, and cloud platforms. Strong SQL skills.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Build language models that help millions write better. Work on grammar correction, style suggestions, and tone detection.
requirements: 3+ years NLP experience. Expertise in transformers and language models. Strong Python skills.
